Interfaces & methodsÂ¶

Currently following interface methods can be called:

interface IOfficeLink
{
    // CDB Actions
    void LoadCDBDocuments();
    void SaveCDBDocument();
    void CreateCDBDocument();
    void CreateCDBDocumentIndex();
    void ChangeCDBDocumentStatus();
    void ChangeCDBDocumentProperties();
    void ShowCDBDocumentProperties();

    // Office Actions
    void ShowOffice();
    string SaveDocument();
    bool CloseDocument();
    void ShowOptionDlg();
    void ShowHelp();
    string GetDocPath();
    char getDecimalSeparator();
}

interface ICDBMetaData
{
    // CDB Actions
    void ManageCDBDocumentVariables();
    void UpdateCDBDocumentVariables();
    void SynchronizeCDBDocumentVariables();

    // CDB Variables
    SList GetCDBDocumentVariables();
    void DeleteCDBDocumentVariable(string var);
    void SelectCDBDocumentVariable(string var);
    string GetCDBDocumentVariableValue(string var);

    // CAD Conf
    bool AllowMetadataManage { get; }
    bool AllowMetadataWrite { get; }
}

interface ICDBPowerReports
{
    // CDB Actions
    void SelectSource();
    void UpdateSchema();
    void CreateTemplate();
    void EditTemplate();
    void UpdateReport();
}

interface ICDBProjectSync
{
    // CDB Actions
    void PublishProject();
    void ImportAttrs();
    void ShowProjectOverview();
    void ShowTasksStructure();
    void ShowTaskProperties();
}
